definition.name: Azure WebApp
definition.description: Deploy Web Apps/Containerized Web Apps to Azure. github.com/Azure/Actions
definition.author: azure

inputs.name: app-name
inputs.description: Name of the Azure Web App

inputs.name: publish-profile
inputs.description: Applies to Web Apps(Windows and Linux) and Web App Containers(linux). Multi container scenario not supported. Publish profile (*.publishsettings) file contents with Web Deploy secrets

inputs.name: slot-name
inputs.description: Enter an existing Slot other than the Production slot

inputs.name: package
inputs.description: Applies to Web App only: Path to package or folder. *.zip, *.war, *.jar or a folder to deploy

inputs.name: images
inputs.description: Applies to Web App Containers only: Specify the fully qualified container image(s) name. For example, 'myregistry.azurecr.io/nginx:latest' or 'python:3.7.2-alpine/'. For multi-container scenario multiple container image names can be provided (multi-line separated)

inputs.name: configuration-file
inputs.description: Applies to Web App Containers only: Path of the Docker-Compose file. Should be a fully qualified path or relative to the default working directory. Required for multi-container scenario

inputs.name: startup-command
inputs.description: Enter the start up command. For ex. dotnet run or dotnet run

inputs.name: resource-group-name
inputs.description: Enter the resource group name of the web app

inputs.name: type
inputs.description: Enter deployment type (JAR, WAR, EAR, ZIP, Static)

inputs.name: target-path
inputs.description: Target path in the web app. For ex. '/home/site/wwwroot'

inputs.name: clean
inputs.description: Delete existing files target directory before deploying

inputs.name: restart
inputs.description: Restart the app service after deployment

inputs.name: sitecontainers-config
inputs.description: Applies to Sitecontainers, containes a list of siteContainer specs

outputs.name: webapp-url
outputs.description: URL to work with your webapp
